summary: Successfully tested the new Sliding Window algorithm for similar pattern search. All requested features are working correctly: Similar stocks now have DIFFERENT dates (found patterns anywhere in 7-year history), '1A:' and '3A:' labels show performance after pattern completion, comparison modal displays 'Kalıptan Sonra' section with 1 Ay and 3 Ay percentages.
passed_tests: Backend API health check - 200 OK (15/15 pytest tests passed)
Login with test2@test.com / test1234 - SUCCESS
Dashboard loads with 444 BIST stocks
Stock selection (THYAO) - Working
Analiz Et button navigates to analysis page
Analysis page shows candlestick chart with peak/trough markers
Summary statistics display correctly
'Benzer Hisseleri Bul' button triggers search
Similar stocks search completes in ~55 seconds
20 similar patterns found for THYAO
NEW: Similar stocks have DIFFERENT dates (e.g., BUCIM: 2023-05-23 → 2025-05-23 vs THYAO: 2024-01-08 → 2026-01-08)
NEW: '1A:' label shows 1 month after pattern performance (e.g., -8.87%)
NEW: '3A:' label shows 3 months after pattern performance (e.g., +0.99%)
NEW: Dates like '2023-05-23 → 2025-05-23' appear in similar stocks list
Clicking on similar stock shows details panel
'Karşılaştır' (Compare) button opens comparison modal
NEW: Modal shows 'Kalıptan Sonra' section with 1 Ay and 3 Ay percentages
NEW: Left chart shows reference stock (THYAO) with 'Referans' badge and dates 2024-01-08 - 2026-01-08
NEW: Right chart shows similar stock (BUCIM) with 'Benzer' badge and DIFFERENT dates 2023-05-23 - 2025-05-23
Peak/trough comparison tables displayed for both stocks with different dates

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All new sliding window features working correctly)

seed_data_creation: None required - using existing test user
context_for_next_testing_agent: New sliding window algorithm fully tested and working. Key changes: (1) Similar pattern search now scans 7 years of history for each stock using sliding window approach, (2) Results show DIFFERENT dates for each stock (not same as reference), (3) New fields: after_pattern_1m, after_pattern_3m showing what happened after pattern completed, (4) Turkish labels '1A:' = 1 month after, '3A:' = 3 months after. Search takes 55-60 seconds due to extensive history scanning. Test user test2@test.com / test1234 is available for testing.
